content.detailedDescription:
I saw a u.F.O. !���
some time around then i saw a u f o . i must explain that u f o stands for unidentified flying object! ���it is just that! not little green men! all i can do is tell you what i saw! i now have a private pilots license and i know airplanes! i know flight paths too! i can tell you that too this day i still don't know what it was! this was not just some fast moving light in the sky a long way off ! it was quite close and i have only seen this one ! it happened ���mcalester���oklahoma back in the late 60's ���maybe 70. it was a nice clear day spring or summer about one hour before sundown! i was at d's mom and dads house standing in the front yard looking east! the house was on south street that runs east and west! it is about three miles north of the city airport! the airport is small but can handle small jets! with the wind out of the south a left down wind will put you east of the run way and turning base will head you west! i first noticed what looked like the landing light to a small cessna turning base in the pattern! maybe 900 ft ��� ��� a g l . i stood just a little west where it should turn final! almost under the turn! i was. use to watching ���the little aircraft make this maneuver ! this light on base was strange because i only saw the light and not the aircraft ! that is what got my attention first! ���i kept looking but saw only the light ! its speed was consistent with say a cessna 152 in the pattern!
it kept coming and still nothing! i yelled at d that's a u f o get a camera! she rushed in the house but quickly came back and said she didn't have one ! by this time i should have seen the aircraft clearly ���in the bright sky but only this light! no sound ! cessna's at that hight ���make a lot of engine noise ! nothing! when it should have turned final it did not! it did not change course ! it was now directly over my head and the light had changed ! with out a blink or even fading down i could clearly see not one bright light but four it was a seamless transition the one light looked just like four locomotive main head lights bulbs on dim ! that kind of orangish color and the grouping was just the same also in a tight diamond pattern . but now i could see the lights were in the center of something about 60 feet across that was spinning around like the blades of a helicopter. but i could see them but could not see them! it was like looking through the thing !No aircraft body and no sound ���and the four lights! as it passed slowly over the four lights again appeared as one bright light again and the spinning part was unseen also ! still no sound ! i watched as this light continued west about the same distance as when i had first saw it east of me! i was a bright light against a well lit clear blue sky! then twice something flashed out pure white not like a gas but a plasma burst ! then it blinked out and was gone!���
for what it is worth a man who d worked with and lived about one mile north said that he was working out in his yard about the same time and noticed a silver cigar thing ! he said he only saw it but did not pay anymore attention to it! d saw it too! and that's my u f o story !
content.summary: Bright light first over head 4 dimmer orang lights same place looked like disk back to bright light flashed out

content.detailedDescription: Wasilla, alaska: we were driving home from an awards ceremony at the middle school... driving west on the parks highway to lake lucille, where we live. the night was clear and full of stars. we became aware of two orbs in the sky near our home. they appeared stacked and about 200 feet apart,a bit offset and not moving. the orbs were orange and glowing. when the orbs were first noticed, my wife asked, "when did they put in a new tower?" there are no towers near our home - new or old. i pulled over to have a closer look. we got out of the truck and watched as one orb left. as it began to move, the orb changed color from orange to red. it moved rapidly to the west and disappeared in approximately five seconds. the second orb followed suit approximately 30 seconds after the first disappeared; same color change, same direction, however, the second orb disappeared within approximately 3 seconds (much quicker than the first). no sound, no emissions, no strobes from either orb. we live in alaska and are accustomed to a wide variety of military aircraft, aurora borealis,and fireworks. the objects had no commonality with aircraft nor did they look like stars or planets (besides they were too close). the orbs were not frightening or disturbing, but does cause us to wonder - what are they? where are they from? where are they going? will they return?
content.summary: Two orbs, glowing orange, stationary, hovering, approximately  a mile away/above. both left within one minute of each other. no sound, two to three seconds to vanish - to west.

content.detailedDescription: It was thanksgiving. some amount of time after my family members had left my father's residence which is located on a field edge, i'd guess about an hour, i decided i'd like to enjoy a refreshing beer. it was probably an hour past dark, there was a full moon or very close to it so visibility on the ground was no issue. i walked to the local gas station about a mile, picked up a twelve pack and walked back. this was uneventful however traffic was unusually heavy almost a constant stream of headlights. when i reached home i set the beer down on the picnic table in the front lawn. across the street from the front lawn is a field about a 60 yards wide and then a tree line where a decent patch of woods begins. the field is long but not very wide as corn and soybean fields go, it widens towards the middle. it was dead calm and i was the only one outside in my neighborhood. anyways, as soon as i set the beer down i tear open the box crack one open and take a sip. i look up as to soak in that big gorgeous glowing moon. however, something else immediately catches my attention. an "object" pulsates once significantly does a 90 degree or maybe even slightly better turn and shoots off like a meteor. the object was headed east at first, getting close to encroaching over the illuminessence of the moon. then it turned north towards the city of peoria seemingly, which is not located more than 10 miles from my position. the color of the object was actually very similar if not identical to the bright white of a glowing full moon. when it pulsated it increased the diameter of the light by a quarter diameter or slightly better. the speed at which it was traveling before it turned and zipped away was equivalent to a small plane. it was either a small object closer to the ground or larger one farther away. the entire sighting didn't last for more than 4 seconds. i would estimate 3 seconds from the time i saw it pulsate to the end of its streak as it left. i guess the best word to explain my feeling was flabbergasted. i was not expecting to see anything when i glanced up at the moon. there was zero air traffic at the time nor for the next ten minutes i stayed outside, which is otherwise a fairly high traffic airspace. i went inside as it was cold out. i have watched air traffic all my life, it did not flash like aircraft lights but pulsated clearly just once. also the first third of the streak when it took off seemed just so very very slightly slower than the next to thirds, which a meteor would have a constant speed. the second two thirds of the streak seemed to be in the realm of shooting stars i have seen in the past. which i have seen my fair share. the sighting was like, explain this. it was no plane or meteor. it was and unexplained aerial phenomenon. i enjoy remaining skeptical. however, i have listened to testimonies such as gordon cooper and edgar mitchell. while i am totally open to listening to any explanation. there are no swamps to produce "gas" in central illinois. and when i think about it a part of me in the area where my heart lies seems to know exactly what it was. any way you cut it life on earth is an extraordinary phenomenon in and of itself.
content.summary: Object pulsated once shot off like shooting star

content.detailedDescription: It was cloudy night but i have been for past 15 months ufo watching due to previous event that terrified me. luckily i was able to get out right after dark and drove to park where i can see  lights from town contrast with low dark clouds. i was only there for couple minutes when i saw two triangle crafts coming at tree line far from me (not visibly tell they were triangle crafts but i recognized the light pattern) so i waited and it flew right to where i was and turned above me and flew away. it hovered briefly at tree line to my right. it was slow moving and only made a noise you can feel more than hear sometimes.  i've noticed they affect street lights and turn off my nikon when its in video mode. its brand new only had it since christmas and every week i put in $14 lithium batteries just to comfort myself that i'm not crazy. i do have a short video 38 seconds but its one of my better ones. ive only been able to see the full outline on 2 seperate occasions.This is my first report since my initial terrifying sighting at end of october in 2012 but i've witnessed them close to every night past 2 months.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw triangle ufo..The outline and lights in contrast to background light in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At aprox 6:40 pm jan-30-14 i observed a dark red object with a light red almost orange halo pulsating in eastern sky headed south south-east toward orion's belt once it was almost to the belt it made a quick course change and headed almost due east and upward at aprox. 65-75 degree angle. due to very high altitude of object i estimate it's speed at 5000+ mph it headed off in said direction (away to east and up) till i could not see it any longer. i noticed an airplane at a normal altitude that seemed to head the same direction as if to observe the object. due to objects altitude the plane would not have been able to "pursue" this object (i'm sure it was in space or outer space). the object traversed 75% of the visible sky and made its way off into space too far to observe in less than 5 min (3 1/2-4 1/2 min by my estimation. while it would take a plane much longer. my father and i have seen a few objects, most far away but 2 closer and 1 a bit too close (we laugh about it now but at the time it rattled us a bit.) and we both have aviation experience this was no plane and i don't believe satellites hook a hard left. after the sighting i decided that enough was enough and it was time to make my first report to mufon (i plan to report all sightings i can't debunk from this point on). and there you have it. :) 

by the way we are both military vets and have people who can speak to our character and credibility. and my father just a couple years ago didn't believe or was up in the air so to speak about ufo's or craft but is now a firm believer and angry about the lack of truth from gov. i was 50-50 till an event triggered a memory from childhood and since then (quite a few years since) i have only seen a few things i could not debunk and even less that im sure or pretty sure were craft. (the childhood one was the most elaborate and dad remembers me running into his room freaked out)
content.summary: Dark red object lighter almost orange halo around

content.detailedDescription: I can't sleep and i always looking in the sky because i just what to know what to me and why they take me away for days. i always see lights and feel fun at time my body
content.summary: They can and take me away and i had a baby

content.detailedDescription: I was walking westward from my neighbors house (4 houses away) to my house at 9:20 pm and looked up into the sky.  i noticed some lights emerging from behind the trees to the south, thinking they were a couple of private planes just leaving the local airport.  the two lights were not airplane lights, but yellow/gold "verticle bow tie" shaped lights that were moving more slowly northward "in formation".  a few seconds later another two yellow/gold bow tie shaped lights, following the same path, emerged and followed the first two.  the whole time all were moving in a formation pattern of about three inches apart vertically and horizontially (when you hold your fingers up to the sky).  i ran into my house and brought my wife out to see the ufo's.  as we watched, the four lights moved slowly until they were west of us, and at that time being closest to us.  they then came to a stop and hovered there for a couple of minutes.  then three slowly moved north westward away from the fourth bow tie light and faded away.  about 25 to 30 seconds later, the fourth hoverig light just disappeared in it's place.  during the whole time of observance there was "no" sound of any kind.  the yellow/gold bow tie shape was very sharp and distinct.  my wife and i were in awe the whole time.  we have lived near airports our whole lives, and knew we were not watching airplanes.  we had to watch the incident until it's conclusion, no matter how long it took.  it just didn't last long enough.
content.summary: Four yellow/gold, bright, verticle bowtie-shaped-lights, moved slowly northward accross sky in formation until west of us, hovered a couple minutes, three drifted away, then fourth disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I finished work at six a clock then i went home then i put water in the tub. took of my clothes then something pulled me out of the water. after that happened i went to the front porch and just looked out and there was a grey, round saucer about 6 feet off the ground over the corn field. in all at once the windows on the ufo opened and there was grey green children like entity. after that i was looking at them and they were looking at me with great big eyes,maybe a little nose, and a little small mouth with a big head. as i was looking a saw a animal but it looked like a pig and it was split open{we had pigs on the farm were i lived and work}. as it was starting to leave the windows closed and it moved across the road and it started to go up gradually then accreted and it looked like a ball of fire. then it changed to a bright light{it seemed like the heaven opened up and it went in}. later my family came home i tried to tell them what i saw but i couldn't. so now 20 years later i had a nightmare i woke up screaming and my voice sounded like a animal that was inside of me. so now 2014 i'm thinking something else happened to me but i don't know what.
content.summary: Round,6ft,six little entity inside with a pig on the table

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were walking to his girlfriends house after school. we first observed this object at the top of the hill. once we turned the corner at the top of the hill, it  a block and a half walking south west. we saw it again. this time a closer. the street we turned on was pamela dr. out was jus there over a house just hovering and making a soft buzzing nose. there was at least 10 other people watching this.
content.summary: Tambourine looking or bottom of a blimp looking. it actually did a show of lights and direction for the crowd.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were walking to his girlfriends house after school. we first observed this object at the top of the hill. once we turned the corner at the top of the hill, it  a block and a half walking south west. we saw it again. this time a closer. the street we turned on was pamela dr. out was jus there over a house just hovering and making a soft buzzing nose. there was at least 10 other people watching this.
content.summary: Tambourine looking or bottom of a blimp looking. it actually did a show of lights and direction for the crowd.

content.detailedDescription: It was summer of 2006.  it was my birthday july 17. it was about 10 o clock pm i was out front hanging out with my friends talking and i looked up to the horizon area of the night sky and i noticed a black object. i realized it was a triangle because it blocked out the stars. it had no lights no sound. from my view in the sky it was about the size of a basketball. in reality it must have been about the size of baseball field. it was creepy. i looked at my friends but they were still talking to eachother so i got up and followed it with my head and it just kept going. it hovered as it passed by over the rooftops of the neighborhood houses maybe above power lines height. it was towards my grandmas house looking at it from my moms house. it started nw then it was looking towards the e and then last it was ne. then i lost sight of it behind my view of the trees up ahead. it really changed me. i told my friends what i had just seen and they thought i was crazy.
content.summary: Black triangle, silent no lights just hovered over houses in a path like motion then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: First observed gold light to the north of where i was standing.The object began to move to the west and light went out. i next observed the vehicle just west of me. the object was coming toward me . the craft was no longer emitting a gold exterior light. as the craft approached i noticed that there was an observation deck. the deck was lit with a gold light. the deck also had a platform with a gold rail resting on 3 posts. on the platform there was a figure . this individual was wearing a gold jumpsuit. the craft passed directly over me. there was no sound and no light. the stars were blacked out by the vehicles passing. after it passed the stars  were again visible but no sign of the craft. i have only offered this info to my family and few friends. i have often wondered if this craft was seen by any one else. the incident occurred between 1967 and 1969 . i cannot be more specific. i would love to know if anyone else experienced this event
content.summary: Observed stationary in the north- vehicle next seen coming toward me heading east

content.detailedDescription: Late one night i rode my a tv to the top off our property.Our house was below a hill where we had 25 acres of pasture for cows. i checked the perimeter fence first then drove to the center turned off the a tv leaned back staring up into the stars. the night was clear no clouds only bright stars.As i smoked a cigarette  i saw something that made me doubt my sanity.I watched this craft move over the hills temporarily blocking the stars behind then exposing the stars as it moved.I watched  it travel over me again blocking out stars above then shot a bright beam out on  the far side of the property. it slowly directed the light directly to me.Ithe light centered on me making me very shocked an scared.I don't know how long it shown down on me but the light then ascended back up  what concerned me was our pastures grass was thick  an tall since we hadn't put our cows out yet to graze.This craft was silent reflective large an never once moved any grass around me.Ias it moved away i slapped my cheeks to make sure i wasn't dreaming,i rode back home fast to tell my father but didn't thinking he wouldn't believe me.
content.summary: Craft shiny frflecting  the stars

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to dinner with my neighbors.  we were all riding in the same vehicle.  there were 3 of us (2 adults, 1 child).  as we came back to town later that night, we all witnessed a huge fireball ascending very quickly from the ground into the sky. we all were stunned and were asking each other what had just happened.  we all saw it right in front of us.  i don't remember seeing a craft, just the huge fireball.  there is now a pond were we saw this occur.
content.summary: Fireball ascending into sky

content.detailedDescription: My family and i had just gotten home from the lake. we were all sitting around outside. it was about 9:30pm. it was a very clear sky.My family was sitting on my pourch which faces west. i went into the street to look at the stars like i normally do. i turned back toward my house, i was facing east,  when i noticed a very dim looking, large, round fireball looking thing. the only way to describe the color is it was on fire, without any flame or smoke. it was directly over my house, about 100 feet up. it appeared to be about the size of a big van. i couldn't tell the exact shape because it was blurred or morphing like. as i spotted it, as asked my only sober friend(the rest of my family was drinking and though i was joking when i yelled ufo) if she was seeing it to and she was. so i knew i wasn't just seeing things. we watched it for about 30secs then i slowly took off over the houses going north. it made no sound at all. then about a half mile it vanishes.  either it blinked  out or took of so fast i couldn't see it.  i know for a fact it wasn't a helicopterair  or airplane. i lived close to tinker air force and i was used to low flying aircrafts of many different kinds.
content.summary: Fire ball like, above my house. hovered then took off slowly, then took off fast and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I am 47 years old, i have never seen a ufo. i am not a big believer in ufo's but i can not explain this. the photos i took visually confirm the story.
i was driving home from work when i looked up through my windshield and saw the strangest vapour trails i had ever seen. i work in aerospace, i have travelled around the world over 12 times...I have seen a lot of vapour trails and they are not uncommon on this part of my drive home. but these vapour trails were like nothing i have ever seen. they were so strange it made someone like me get out of the car and shoot them with my phone camera. i thought they looked that strange. 
there were multiple trails, they were dashed and dotted almost like morse code and they were moving in multiple different directions as if produced by multiple craft moving in multiple different directions.
unfortunately i was shooting into the sun so i took many shots hoping one of them would show these vapour trails.
it was several days later before i even looked at my photos, i could barely make out a few streaks because of the sun glare but my camera caught a floating, glowing blue object in 5 of the 8 photos i took. i did not see this glowing blue object, i was trying to shoot the vapour trails so i was stunned to find it in the photos.
photo 1: glowing blue sphere hiding behind a tree behind intersection. (4:01 pm)
photo 2: photo of my car to prove i was there and not making this up. (4:01 pm)
photo 3: glowing blue object in front of intersection 5 or so feet off ground beside a pick-up truck. (4:02 pm)
photo 4: object not visible. (4:02 pm)
photo 5: object appears 50-60 feet above intersection (4:02 pm)
photo 6: object appears 80-100 feet above and behind intersection (4:02 pm)
photo 7: object very bright 10 or so feet above intersection (4:02 pm)
photo 8: i was back in my car and moving again and took one last shot of the vapour trails through my windshield yet camera records an explosion in the trees on far side of the intersection. (4:06 pm)
none of the other drivers in the photos stopped, none of them swerved or showed any signs of seeing something unusual. i didn't see anything myself other then the strange vapour trails in the sky, yet my phone camera definitely caught a glowing blue sphere moving in all three axis (x,y,z) right in front of many people and yet no one seemed to see it at all.
i thought is it a defect of my camera or lens? yet no other photo i have taken with it shows anything like this. the camera was a nokia 920.
content.summary: Multiple vapor trails in sky, camera caught other objects not visible at time

content.detailedDescription: I was out feeding the dog and i noticed an airplane so then i go and get the dogs water and when i got back out i noticed lights. i thought it was an airplane at first but then i saw its silhouette was a pentagonal shape i also heard no sounds exept the wind
content.summary: Pentagon in sky 4lights

content.detailedDescription:
Got to work and most of the people in the company were outside staring at the sky, i couldnt see them at first but then they pointed them out to me, saw them, took pics and video and went back in, there were 8 then with one getting out of the formation so mostly just 7.

got in to set my place in order to start working and like 10 minutes later someone said there were more, they were like in 3 different formations, one far left clearly higher in the sky of around 30-40 (they were hard to see plain sight, impossible in phone camera) and more to the right not so high in the sky another 8 objects in weird formation, sometimes they would do a line of 3 like    .   .   .   with the rest floating around them.

got bored (and a bit scared to be honest) and went back in, i could hear people still talking about them for another 30 mins.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: F*cking scary! around 50 ufos in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from matamoras pa coming over highpoint mountain on route 23 when i got the crest of the mountain you can look out and see the valley and then the mountains and ski slopes in vernon on the other side. high above the ski slopes was a big orange/reddish ball that just hovered there. there was no movement which made me believe it was a light at the ski slopes. then i realized it was way too large and way too high in the sky to be a light from the ski slopes. i kept watching it as i drove down the mountain and it still didn't move and it appeared to get bigger. i also realized that it it was an airplane or helicopter because it didn't have traditional running lights plus it was much larger. i decided to try to get a photo of it but needed to fins a safe place to pull off the road. when i finally parked and tried to get a photo, my iphone could not get a focus on it because the sky was too dark. all of a sudden the light just disappeared but it never moved. there was no movement at all it just disappeared as if someone just turned the lights off. i can't say it is extraterrestrial at all, the only thing i can say is that it was a strange light that i just can't explain.  i'm just curious as to if anyone else saw it and may have a logical answer for it.
content.summary: Red/orange ball hovering above the ski slopes in vernon nj. too high and too big to be a plane or helicopter and didn't have traditional running lights. then it just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car headed back home and seen a strange object in the sky. it made no noise and was completely silent. the object was round and have red flashing lights on it.
content.summary: Object was flying low and was silent in the area.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work saw bright light over trees so i kept driving towards it and caught up to it. i did record it on my phone till i got so close the trees obstructed but i got one last look as i had to turn and it was about 75degrees to my east it tiped a bit and i noticed threes round white lights under it as it descended below treeline. i made multiple passes by where i last saw it but it was no longer visable and no lights emitted from woods. very rural out there and it was  in area that was cleared of trees for power lines. between north 33rd st and n 35th strees as they run paralell.
content.summary: Followed bright lights till descended below tree line in unaccesable area by car. road was a t

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work saw bright light over trees so i kept driving towards it and caught up to it. i did record it on my phone till i got so close the trees obstructed but i got one last look as i had to turn and it was about 75degrees to my east it tiped a bit and i noticed threes round white lights under it as it descended below treeline. i made multiple passes by where i last saw it but it was no longer visable and no lights emitted from woods. very rural out there and it was  in area that was cleared of trees for power lines. between north 33rd st and n 35th strees as they run paralell.
content.summary: Followed bright lights till descended below tree line in unaccesable area by car. road was a t

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 8:50 pm, ... i was walking out the door to go smoke. i looked up at the clouds and saw what i can only describe as a shooting star but traveling north east in a very straight line. it was not descending nor ascending, it was fast. then it appeared to stop dead, and hover almost.  i thought it had disappeared,  and that's when and a very bright like almost nitrous type boost came out from what i can only assume was the rear end. like you see in rockets. only smaller. it shot up and east immediately afterwards and disappeared completely.
content.summary: It looked like a shooting star it was very high.

content.detailedDescription:
Once again i was sitting on my sofa looking out my nw facing window. i have seen many times these bright objects and they got my attention, once again this morning. 

the night before last, they were in the skies, same area around, 1:30am on jan. 27th. i have pictures of that incident also projecting white beams.  at 3:30am this morning, january 29th, 2014, i took a couple of pictures and then noticed there were lots of bright objects in the sky. i turned off the lights around me, inside as well as outside, i went outdoors at that time. there were so many bright objects, i didn't know what to do first. it was like the perfect storm. clear, cold and almost cloudless with stars in the sky, twinkling. when i snapped a couple of shots, i actually couldn't see anything on my camera's screen, it appeared to be black. all of a sudden, lots of colored beams orange, blue and white started showing up. i took a few pictures, it seemed so over whelming to me with so much activity going on, i went back inside to check what i had captured. after about 10 to 15 minutes it became quiet once again, with just one lingering bright object quite a distance away and seemed to be gliding around and hovering but very slowly. it remained for another hour or so and just disappeared. the others exited as quickly as they came. i am not sure what their entire duration was but it wasn't long. it all happened so quickly, i am not certain whether they were gliding around like the lingering one did. i also observed orbs that appeared like they were in the fog.
content.summary: Initially there was a very bright silvery object in nw sky; then it expanded to many objects projecting colored beams in my digital photos.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter who is 5 and myself were coming home in my semi truck. we got to the intersection just before our house and saw a beautiful orange glowing ball over the top of our house. when i told my daughter look at that it slowly started moving north until it got in front of us. when in front of us it made a u-turn and flew over us. as it flew over us it disappeared. we didn't feel scared but amazed. it's almost as if it wanted us to see it.
content.summary: Me and daughter saw hovering over our house then moved in front and turned over us

content.detailedDescription: ...It was nov'93,myself and my girlfriend at the time drove to a beach which is about 20min from where i live.I parked at the top of a cliff and we walked down the footpath to the beach.As it was november,it was a dark evening,approx 6pm.We stood on the sand,i was facing out to sea and she was facing me,after a minute or 2 i noticed a red/orange light or object about the size of a basketball from approx 100ft away appear from behind a cliff to my left.It moved horizontally from east to west at walking pace making absolutely no sound and when out in the open it stopped and remained motionless for 3 to 5 minutes above us about 100 to 150 feet away.The light or orb was red/orange and the light emanating from it was very sharp and in focus not blurred in any way,it was close enough to hit with a stone i reckoned,unfortunately mobile phones didn't have camera's back then.At this stage we got concerned an started to leave,as we did it blinked out and reappeared 10sec later in the same place and remained there until we got the hell out of there,i'm not ashamed to say it scared the hell out of us,i remember it like it was yesterday.Its still a mystery,as i said there was no wind that night it was completely calm and no sound from this object either....That's my up close and personal encounter...Thanks "d".
content.summary: Encounter with a red/orange light or orb.

content.detailedDescription:
I remember it was cold outside. i was sitting on my front steps around 3am praying in a low wisper. when i seen something out of the corner of my eye. it was a thing it appeard blackish gray 15th wide and 30 ft or more in length it didnt move from side to side just moved in a straight line about the speed of somebody walking fast. it made no sound and it wasnt no ufo which in my opinon is just a bunch of hog wash.Anyway as i was looking at it i froze in fear of my life i didnt move a muscle. im only posting this for one reason and that is has anybody seen such a thing i dont venture out to late anymore because im afraid too that thing if it had seen me could have killed me no this boy is staying in
 his house late at night were i belong. if i had to desribe it it would be one big jelly fish.
content.summary: This was no ufo it looked like one big jelly fish

content.detailedDescription: I saw a triangle made up of 3 white lights and 1 red pulsating center light.First spotted it coming from the east and heading west.Observed a pretty much straight line path with minimal sound.Thought i heard a low rumbling but still not sure what was from.10 minutes was the duration of observation.I took several photos with an ipod when object was directly over head and going west.I got in my car and drove so i would come up behind object.I lost track of the object as it headed west over woods.
content.summary: Saw the triangle made up of white lights.Red pulse in middlesa

content.detailedDescription: We were driving back from i-10 on apache road and saw a orange glowing light in the south part of the sky. at first we were like what is that to big and close to be planet or star. it was extremely strange. when we stop in town on mc85 at the circle k we observered it disappear and then saw 3 more just hovering  about 10 miles or more west in the sky where we saw the single light disappear almost triangle . we drove towards the post office on miller road and mc85 to get a better view and it was gone. soon after we saw planes in sky and thought hmmm that was not a plane. i left my phone at home and didn't get to take pictures.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We were driving back from i-10 on apache road and saw a glowing light in the south part of the sky when we stop in town on mc85 we observered it disappear and then saw 3 more just hovering west of where we saw the single light disappear almost triangler.

content.detailedDescription: It was super bowl sunday,iwas at jacks stake house watching the game.After the game i helped my buddy tommy clean up,he worked their,it was about 130am when we left to go to my house.My house was about 2miles away from their,we were going down hale sreet witch runs on the left side of the valley, right along the hills when we saw a craft tracking us!It was a blood red dot but i could tell it was a craft,my buddy tommy started yelling look at that thing its gross!!! he was grossed out about it, that weird, so i turn my car off and coast so i can hear if it makes any noise,it made no noise at all, nothing!!! so i started up my car and it stated tracking us again, so did the same thing and herd no noise again, by this time tommy was freaked out, i knew this was nothing from this solar system,i thought it was awesome!!! i all knew they were out their.I live on the west side of the valley, i pulled up to my condo and their it was hovering right on top of a peak we call el toro,so i jumped on top of this fence to get a better look, now the craft was a blueish green color what a awesome color!!! it shined a blue light on me, i could see my shadow on my gorge door,when it did that it gave me a weird fealling,the only time i had that same fealling was when i was a 49er game,it was the 49ers against the falcons, a nationaly televised game,every time that camera would come in contact with me it gave me that same weird feeling,anyway i pulled out my buck knife and raised it up and yelled i knew you fuckers were out there,at that same time i herd a helicopter coming so i looked up at the craft and it slowly duck behind the peak so i jumped down from the fence and watch the copter fly by to my amazement after the copter was gone the craft came back up so i jumped back on top of the fence at this time tommy was totally freak out so i yelled calm down it did not work.I turned around and tried to get a better look at the craft but all i could see was a blue light just like the video the guardian,it was the same craft now i here car coming down the road fast the craft ducks down behind the peak again so i jump down and i see two black cars fly by now that i think about it the copter flat black anyways after the cars were gone the craft came back up now i had to get tommy in a head lock to calm him down now he looks up and said the craft was splitting in half i could not see that now here comes the copter again and the craft did the same thing we watch it as it watched us fore about another ten min and the craft shot up and made it self look like a star so i tell tommy to watch the star so i could go run in the house get my mother so when i came back out with my mom tommy was back in the car,i could not tell what star was a star what was the craft so my mom thought i was nuts. morgan hill calif is a meca for ufos this is not my only sighting!!!!!!!!!! later that night they came in my house but that's another story!!!!!!! the video the guardian is what i saw that night!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Saw a blood red craft following me and my buddy tommy in my car,this craft looked just like the same craft that was on the vidio the guardian,witch i seen 2 months later!
